languages.text: "А теперь, прошу вас, давайте покинем нижние палубы. Все еще считаю их неподходящим местом для прогулок Вольного Торговца".
"And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."
languages.original_text: "А теперь, прошу вас, давайте покинем нижние палубы. Все еще считаю их неподходящим местом для прогулок Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “至于现在，请您先与我一起离开底层甲板吧。如果行商浪人打算伸展一下筋骨的话，还有很多更合适的地方。”
languages.original_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."

traits.locale_text: “至于现在，请您先与我一起离开底层甲板吧。如果行商浪人打算伸展一下筋骨的话，还有很多更合适的地方。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Y ahora, por favor, abandonemos las cubiertas inferiores. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quiere estirar las piernas, hay lugares mucho más apropiados».
languages.original_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."

traits.locale_text: «Y ahora, por favor, abandonemos las cubiertas inferiores. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quiere estirar las piernas, hay lugares mucho más apropiados».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「さしあたって今は、どうかこの下層デッキを離れましょう。自由開拓者が足を延ばしたいというのなら、もっとふさわしい場所がございます」
languages.original_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."

traits.locale_text: 「さしあたって今は、どうかこの下層デッキを離れましょう。自由開拓者が足を延ばしたいというのなら、もっとふさわしい場所がございます」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Und nun verlassen wir bitte die Unterdecks. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich die Beine vertreten will, dafür gibt es deutlich geeignetere Orte."
languages.original_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."

traits.locale_text: "Und nun verlassen wir bitte die Unterdecks. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich die Beine vertreten will, dafür gibt es deutlich geeignetere Orte."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Sur ce, regagnons plutôt les ponts supérieurs. Il y a des endroits plus indiqués où vous dégourdir les jambes en toute sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."

traits.locale_text: « Sur ce, regagnons plutôt les ponts supérieurs. Il y a des endroits plus indiqués où vous dégourdir les jambes en toute sécurité. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Artık alt güverteden ayrılalım o hâlde. Hür Tacir Hazretleri yürüyüşe çıkmak isterse daha muvafık yerler mevcuttur."
languages.original_text: "And now, please, let us leave the lower decks. If the Rogue Trader desires to stretch {mf|his|her} legs, there are far more suitable places."

traits.locale_text: "Artık alt güverteden ayrılalım o hâlde. Hür Tacir Hazretleri yürüyüşe çıkmak isterse daha muvafık yerler mevcuttur."
